ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content:
DrumWise Rec. DW01 [Smooth, Nookie, Rregula, Dementia] OUT!






	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	





In the beginning there was word. And after the word came sound. And Drums. And Bass.
DrumWise is the first drum and bass label from the area of South Europe, more precisely from Slovenia established by dj Lunic. 
Its main aim is to promote d’n’b producers from these parts and to build connections between them, so that with synergetic effects 
music can touch more hearts. Music policy is wide and it goes from deep jazzy, funky, disco, to harder drum and bass with strong melodies, 
deep bass, punchy drums and sometimes lovely vocals. One cannot expect anything less than stories, journeys, and gatherings and experiences. 
It’s what DrumWise essentially is. It’s what music essentially is.



DW01 OUT NOW!!!

Massive tune from Smooths collaboration with Dementia and Rregula. B-side perfect remix from master Nookie.


	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	





A Side: Smooth feat. Dementia & Rregula - On A mission

B Side: Smooth - Slave (Nookie remix)



Seek and you will find.
DrumWise is not new in the field of drum and bass and first release is only a step on path. On a mission tells what essentially is all about. 
With rhythm section coming in from the start, this collaboration with the rising Slovenian hope Smooth and already established Dementia and Rregula, 
gives no space to breathe. Intro disco feeling, goes to crunchy uncompromised bass in and after the dropdown, and with disowned vocal in the back it 
creates a proper dancefloor smasher. On the other side, Slave from Smooth, reprogrammed by legendary Nookie is deeper than deep and crossed with huge bass line presha.





direct link: http://www.drumwise.com/smooth-dementia-rregula-nookie-onamission-slave/
more info: http://www.drumwise.com
author: wiz

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
author: Tony_Soprano

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content:
zakaj oglaševalec? pač smo odprli založbo in delam mal reklame, po forumih... in ker se držim pravih tem, mislim da ni razloga da bi bil odstranjen. Če ne poslušaš dnb-ja, ni potrebe da si nestrpen do tistih, katerim je ta reklama interesantna...

lp
author: wiz

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content:
Čestitke ob izdaji prvenca  
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


   A na slovenski d&b sceni sploh še kod drug  razen vas izdaja plate ? Nisem več toliko v d&b vodah zadnje čase, vem pa, da je bilo včasih par obetavnih DJ-ev na sceni.
author: SpaceMonkey

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content: Lahko bi se vsaj potrudil in napisal v slovenščini...
author: Tony_Soprano

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content:
Uauu, prav všečno 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	



sem že pozabil kak je dnb, po dolgem času prav zapaše.
Čestitke tudi z moje strani
pa tudi mene zanima če se še vrti pri nas
author: redorange

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
author: The_Red_Devil

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content: V sloveniji smo edina založba, ki trenutno izdaja drumnbass. So pa slovenski producentje že izdajali pri tujih založbah in tudi pri nas je lep čas nazaj bila izdana enkrat kompilacija slovenskega dnb-ja pod imenom Monkorama pri založbi Monkibo.
author: wiz

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content:
mislim da večina folka, ki obiskuje forume, zna brati in razumeti angleško, in ker je bila objava narejena za internacionalno promocijo, se mi ni dal za par slovenskih forumov prevajat. Bom pa se naslednjič potrudil, če res koga moti.

lp, wiz
author: wiz

ctx: Prva slovenska dnb založba DrumWise izdala prvenec
content: Obstaja mogoče kakšna stran, kjer so navedeni dnb eventi v sloveniji ali bližnji okolici?
author: Lateral
